text: Two of the Earthly Branches ( 两个时辰 ) is a work for string quartet, composed by He Xuntian in 1983. ==Summary== He Xuntian adopted RD Composition in his work Two of the Earthly Branches. The work won The 3rd prize of International Carl-Marla-Von-Weber Wettbewerbes Fur Kammermusik 1987 Germany. ==References== Category:Compositions by He Xuntian Category:Chamber music compositions Category:1983 compositions Category:Compositions for string quartet
title: Two of the Earthly Branches
